General.Name: Redwood Group Ltd
General.Description: Redwood Group Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the decoration of boutique brand stores in Asia, the Middle East, the United States, and Europe. It also operates as a contract manufacturer of interior fittings for luxury brands; and designs, produces, and sells craftsmanship, metalwork, carpentry joinery and other interior furnishings. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Taipei City, Taiwan.

2.Name: Mr. Pin-Ching  Su
2.Title: Mang. of Fin. & Investor Relations and Chief Governance Officer
